changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.comment: #1: Identify disambiguated orgs and put them in a temp table #2: Update the orgs based on the info in temp_org_disambiguation_table #3: Identify records that should be reindexed #4: Reindex records
changeSet.sql: create temp table temp_org_disambiguation_table as ( select o.id as org_id, od.id as org_disambiguated_id from org o, org_disambiguated od where o.org_disambiguated_id is null and o.name = od.name and o.country = od.country and o.city = od.city and o.region = od.region );
update org o set last_modified=now(), org_disambiguated_id=x.org_disambiguated_id from temp_org_disambiguation_table x where o.id = x.org_id;

create temp table temp_records_to_reindex as ( select distinct(orcid) from org_affiliation_relation where org_id in (select org_id from temp_org_disambiguation_table) union select distinct(orcid) from profile_funding where org_id in (select org_id from temp_org_disambiguation_table) union select distinct(orcid) from peer_review where org_id in (select org_id from temp_org_disambiguation_table) );
